ComicInfo.Title: Dead Man's Hand, Part 4 of 4
ComicInfo.Summary:
Deadman's Hand, Part 4 of 4: Series finale! The people of Deadwood fighting zombie gunfighters and cross-dimensional alien invaders! Oscar Wilde debating for Earth's very existence! Wild Bill Hickok, Calamity Jane, and Clara in a suicidal stagecoach attack! Thomas Edison's redemption! And the Doctor, sacrificing everything one last time... but is it enough?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mark Buckingham (a) & Charlie Kirchoff (c) | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Robert Hack | 2 | Sub | Subscription Photo Cover | Unlisted | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 12:08:22. [CVDB435606]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Charlie Kirchoff, Mark Buckingham, Robert Hack
ComicInfo.Characters: Calamity Jane, Clara Oswald, Oscar Wilde, The Doctor, Thomas Alva Edison, Wild Bill Hickok
